Question: Zhejiang Oswell Electric Technology Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Zhejiang Oswell Electric Technology Co., Ltd

Product: NEV Drive Control Systems

 - Focus on power systems, motors, and control systems
 - Specialization in intelligent connected electric systems
 - Development of IT-based mobility services
 - Ownership of core technologies for NEV electric powertrain systems
 - Comprehensive product development capabilities
 - Reliable testing methods and established management systems
 - Industrial design and manufacturing capacity
 - Diverse product lines featuring energy-saving and safe products

产品：新能源汽车驱动控制系统

- 着重于动力系统、电机和控制系统
- 专注于智能连接电动系统
- 开发基于IT的移动服务
- 拥有NEV电动动力总成系统的核心技术
- 具备全面的产品开发能力
- 可靠的测试方法和建立的管理系统
- 工业设计和制造能力
- 多样化的产品线，提供节能和安全的产品
